p: A wide range of various phytochemicals; alkaloids, glycosides, reducing sugars, phenolic compounds, steroids and terpenoids, flavonoids, tannins and saponin glycosides were tested with their appropriate protocols and reagents. The A. vera methanolic extracts showed presence of most of the phytochemicals tested; though amounts varied in the different accessions.
